Description: Ostracon, fragment of shoulder, neck and rim of a red pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and pink in section, the exterior and upper-section of the interior are covered with a cream-coloured slip, there is one line of incised Coptic text around the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394294) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394294)
